On 9/13/06, Neil Swingler <neil@...> wrote:
>
> Surely even if java=
 5 is not permitted in production code there can be
> no harm in using it t=
o run a unit testing tool.


It's never that simple.  There can be administ=
rative reasons (the sysadmin
team doesn't have time or bandwidth to support=
 two JDK's) and sometimes just
plain common sense reasons (if you run your =
tests and your application with
a different JDK, you might see different re=
sults that will be hard to
diagnose).

-- 
C=E9dric
